Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Sloan
Reviews.Content: This phone has done everything I want in a cell.  There are enough apps to allow me to carry on with persona as well as other business.  It is easy to use and is a good size to fit in pockets.

Reviews.Title: 1 star
Reviews.Author: Miranda
Reviews.Content: Because the phone keep freeze up and you ser charge complete in the background. I would not tell anyone to buy this phone
